Address.Address1: Calle Victor Sanjinez 2662 Plaza Espana Sopocachi

Description.Text: Facilities Guests can feel at home in one of the 20 rooms. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Various gastronomic options are available, including a restaurant, a dining area, a café and a bar. Guests arriving by car can leave their vehicles in the garage or in the car park. Additional services include a transfer service, room service and a laundry service. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. To assist guests with their business- and communication requirements, the business centre offers a fax machine. Rooms The apartment hotel features rooms with a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. Separate bedrooms are also available. A safe and, for a fee, a minibar are also available. The kitchenette is equipped with a fridge and a microwave. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation features a pool. The terrace is a great place to while away the time. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. It is also possible to order breakfast. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: VISA and MasterCard.
